parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: PromptId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the prompt.

nested_items.name: PromptPresignedUrl
nested_items.description: A generated URL to the prompt that can be given to an unauthorized user so they can access the prompt in S3.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when this resource was last modified.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where this resource was last modified.
